Interface CardGame

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigTwo, BigTwoClient

    public interface CardGame
    An interface for a general card game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkMove(int playerID, int[] cardIdx)
      Checks the move made by the player.
      boolean endOfGame()
      Checks for end of game.
      int getCurrentIdx()
      Returns the index of the current player.
      Deck getDeck()
      Returns the deck of cards being used in this card game.

      Returns the list of hands played on the table.

      Returns the number of players in this card game.

      Returns the list of players in this card game.

        void start(Deck deck)
        Starts the card game.

      • makeMove

        void makeMove(int playerID,
              int[] cardIdx)
        Makes a move by the player.
        Parameters:
        playerID - the playerID of the player who makes the move
        cardIdx - the list of the indices of the cards selected by the player

      • checkMove

        void checkMove(int playerID,
               int[] cardIdx)
        Checks the move made by the player.
        Parameters:
        playerID - the playerID of the player who makes the move
        cardIdx - the list of the indices of the cards selected by the player

      • endOfGame

        boolean endOfGame()
        Checks for end of game.
        Returns:
        true if the game ends; false otherwise
